title: @CertainlyT Not bad on the Caitlyn Rework

embed.description: Hey guys, This thread is to discuss Caitlyn's changes with the upcoming season. They should be on PBE tomorrow (Oct. 29). As a preview, I'll summarize the changes and why we are doing them. Major Changes: Base stats All marksmen have received some base stat adjustments; Caitlyn is no exc

body:
Could use a few tweaks here or there, but overall, I like it.
http://media.giphy.com/media/XreQmk7ETCak0/giphy.gif

replies.body:
People don't hate CertainlyT's work?

Is this Bizzaro Forums?
It's the nature of the changes that people get mad about
